name: lanretE :mooD
description:
lanretE :mooD Story

The players were always the good side, OR ARE THEY?  This game shows you how "The Enemies" encounter with the player. Play as a monster from doom world against the player. 

TL; DR 

Doom eternal but reversed. 

Controls

W, A, S, D and space for movement

Left Mouse Click to shoot. 

E to consume your allies. 

How to Play

There will be portals at the end of every level, try to reach them. First 2 level is only for tutorial an story. Lava hurts. Consuming heals. Player bad. 

Goals

KILL THE PLAYER! 

Credits

All the used assets are from epic store marketplace.
